post.body: Check out www.pinkmartini.com ;-)
did u c them @ the house of blues last time they were here? such a good show!
we need to call the soccer ppl that @bcullen suggested! do u have time today?
yes, we'll have fun! =)
i didn't make it w the party! babysitter needed a ride 2 my house which meant an hour back home, an hour back to Clev..
Thank you! Awesome info! Much appreciated. =)
Hope all goes well with the dentist.. Ask for the laughing gas.. That's my advice. ;-)
LOL. I've never had a box from Tiffany's! It makes me happy. I'll switch it soon tho.. =)
are you still in seattle?
Yay! Hooray! I bet you are so psyched. =)
how many? i hope it's not too bad! hate the dentist!
why so late/early my friend? is this for your venture? or someone elses?
1h 17min yay!
I nominate @betty_draper for a Shorty Award in #entertainment because I find all her tweets entertaining. =)
Xmas Ale! Xmas Ale! =)
LMAO Louisville is definitely not worth getting up @ 4, driving an hr 2 the airport 2 find out my mtg is cancelled & tickets nonrefundable!
All I have to say is Louisville KY is not worth getting up @ 4 am
Listening to Pink Martini perform Amado Mio http://tinyurl.com/6o8g92
Watched 'The day the earth stood still' yesterday. An ok flick. Jennifer Connelly's still got it.
Xmas shopping. Three more people to buy for!
Running late and im still stopping for Starbucks
Craving carbs
Leaving for the day! yay!
Another day, another dollar
Humming xmas tunes - must b getting into the spirit
Going to bed-did not get hardly anything done tonight!
I just want to know, is it really that hard to drive?
Shopping @ tower city. it's been awhile. found a wii! yay! =)
Excited about the company xmas party @ howl @ the moon tonight!
Ive decided Im definitely high maitenance
Lucky im in luv w/my best friend. Lucky i have been where i have been. Lucky to b coming home again.
Wish i hadnt checked my wk email bc i cant do a thing while im here. head is ready to explode
The keyboard on her laptop is also missing 8 keys..
Forgot AOL existed but visiting a friend today that uses it. yuck!
lol! i am up and functioning at 5a and there is no reason to be.
Xmas ale makes me miss my best friend
Rec'd a small box from Tiffany & Co. today. I am one very, very, very, happy girl. =) The box itself even makes me happy.
Tummy ache from xmas cookies.
FYI - By "hood" I meant Beachwood. =)
Overwhelming desire 2 invite twitter pals out w/us but silly conservative midwestern girl in me freaks. DM me if ur in the hood on Thur. =)
